title: Upload a photo
description: Adds the photo to the authenticated user's list of photos. These photos can be used when selling.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: PhotoData
fields.description: The actual image data which is base64 encoded.

fields.name: FileName
fields.description: A textual label for the image, which is intended to make it easier for the user to find the photo when creating a listing. If the file name looks like a path (with forward slash or backslash characters) all characters up to the last slash will be removed. The following characters are not allowed: " < > |

fields.name: FileType
fields.description: The file type of the image ("BMP", "GIF", "JPG", "JPEG" or "PNG"). Case is ignored.

returns.description: <PhotoResponse> The ID of the added photo.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The status of the photo operation.

enum.name: Failure
enum.description: The photo action was a failure.

enum.name: Success
enum.description: The photo action was a success.

enum.name: NotMemberPhoto
enum.description: The photo is not owned by the member.

enum.name: NotMemberAuction
enum.description: The auction is not owned by the member.

fields.name: PhotoUrls
fields.description: When uploading a new photo, contains a collection of URLs for this photo, one for each size.

nested_fields.description: The URL for the thumbnail sized photo (always 85x64, with white borders).
The URL for the list view sized photo (scaled down to fit 160x120).
The URL for the medium sized photo (scaled down to fit 175x175).
The URL for the gallery sized photo (scaled down to fit 233x176).
The URL for the large sized photo (scaled down to fit 352x264).
The URL for the full sized photo (scaled down to fit 670x502).
The URL for the plus sized photo (scaled down to fit).
